pullrequest.title: Add proper flexibility to force_torque sensor specification, solving issue #940

content.raw:
Ok, I will modify the PR as soon as @scpeters merge its modifications from https://bitbucket.org/scpeters/gazebo-traversaro (everything should be ok anyway, but I am not so confident in Mercurial to deal with a merge between three different remotes). 

P.s. : I copy & pasted the code from the IMU sensor ( #!/osrf/gazebo/src/e4a82bd4b73fc67609cfa156486c5eae6f501698/gazebo/sensors/ImuSensor.cc?at=default#cl-81 ) so I guess we should add a check also there.
content.html:
Ok, I will modify the PR as soon as @scpeters merge its modifications from https://bitbucket.org/scpeters/gazebo-traversaro (everything should be ok anyway, but I am not so confident in Mercurial to deal with a merge between three different remotes).

P.s. : I copy & pasted the code from the IMU sensor ( #!/osrf/gazebo/src/e4a82bd4b73fc67609cfa156486c5eae6f501698/gazebo/sensors/ImuSensor.cc?at=default#cl-81 ) so I guess we should add a check also there.
